text:
="preserve">Liladhar Vaghela (17 February 1935 – 16 September 2020) was an Indian politician. He was born in Gujarat, Indian. He was a member of Lok Sabha between 2014 to 2019 as a member of the Indian National Congress. He was also a member of the Gujarat Legislative Assembly betweem 1975 to 1980, 1985 to 1995, 1998 to 2002 and lastly from 2007 to 2014.
Vaghela died on 16 September 2020 in Gandhinagar, Gujarat from acute respiratory failure, aged 85.
